title: King man charged in shooting death of 17-year-old
content:
A King man is charged with murder in the shooting death of a 17-year-old Stokes County man on Saturday afternoon, police said.
Roger Dale Phillips III, 19, of Cliff View Drive, was being held without bond, according to a news release from King police. The release did not give the name of the victim.
The shooting occurred at an apartment complex at 113 Pineview Drive in King.
